context/7: Yes.
context/8: Do you hear me, Mrs. Brenner?

context: It was a good idea that you sent that paper...
response: It was a good idea that you sent that paper... with the image of a bat.
context/1: I need his help to organize my papers.
context/4: In two or three days.
context/7: Eduardo, why don't we leave the country and forget this.

context: How do you know?
context/0: But not the renegades we're looking for.
context/2: Sir, we ran across a band of Cheyenne off the reservation.
context/4: Thank you, Captain.
context/7: Oh, send him right in.

context: Start on that one over there.
response: If Indians don't attack at night, why can't we bring water in there?
context/0: # Pass the bucket down the line...
context/1: # Pass the bucket down the line
context/3: # We've been working all day long
context/4: # We've been working all day long
context/5: # We've been working all day long

context: Hurry, Indians!
context/4: Sergeant Hannah!
context/7: Well, I hope his horse is good.
context/9: It's not good to have too many people know about a hoard of gold.

context: I'm 300 miles from home without a penny in my pocket.
context/0: Say, what are you gonna do about me?
context/2: And still others we're furiously angry.
context/3: Is that what you call entertainment?
context/4: The whole house was in an uproar.
context/5: All the kids were screaming their heads off.
context/7: A fine trick the play on people.

context: The district attorney included.
response: So this man calls from L.A. last night.
context/1: Some people might think I was overzealous.
context/2: Taking charge of an estate before there was an estate.
context/4: If he is, I've committed a crime or two.
context/7: For what?

context: You're twisting my words.
context/0: I didn't say that at all.
context/1: Now, wait a minute, I didn't say that.
context/2: So you have made no progress then?
context/3: You can't expect us to nab the man instantly when he left no clues at all.
context/4: Now, see here, this only happened the night before last.
context/5: No, I'm afraid the public won't accept that in this case, Sergeant.
context/6: To report at an early date.
context/7: However, you may say that we expect to have something definite...
context/8: What we might know and what we're able to tell you are two different things.
context/9: You've made no progress so far.
